molecular.io.read_dcd¶

molecular.io.read_dcd(fname, topology=None, backend='cython')[source]¶

Read in DCD file with fname. This function is partially based off https://www.ks.uiuc.edu/Research/namd/wiki/index.cgi?ReadingDCDinFortran

Parameters

  • fname (str) – Name of DCD file.

  • topology (Topology) – (Optional) Topology file to load for coordinates.

  • backend (str) – How to load the DCD? (Default: “scipy”)

Returns

Instance of Trajectory object.

Return type

Trajectory

Next topic
